Wrapper

description:
Class BitcoinCashTx.
This class is responsible for calculating the fee,
calculating the available amount to send, and generating and signing a Bitcoin Cash transaction

description: Create a BitcoinCashTx

params.name: data
params.description: Input data for generating a transaction, calculating a fee or available amount

params.name: data.feeList
params.description: Set of raw Bitcoin Cash fees

params.name: data.customFee
params.description: Custom fee entered by the user

params.name: data.nodes
params.description: External and internal Bitcoin Cash nodes

name: calcFee
description: Calculating the fee amount

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array>} Returns a set of fees for a specific transaction amount

return.description: Returns a set of fees for a specific transaction amount

name: calcEmptyFee
description:
Sets an array of zero fees.
Used when the user does not have enough funds for the transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Array} Returns an array with zero fees

return.description: Returns an array with zero fees

description: Finds a list of inputs for a specific transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns an object with a list of inputs, the total fee amount, and the total amount of all inputs

return.description: Returns an object with a list of inputs, the total fee amount, and the total amount of all inputs

description: Creating a Bitcoin Cash transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns the raw transaction and transaction hash if sent successfully

params.name: data.fee
params.description: The transaction fee and list of inputs

return.description: Returns the raw transaction and transaction hash if sent successfully

name: src/class/ETH/EthereumSync.js
EthereumSync
description:
Class EthereumSync
This class allows you to get information about the balance on a ethereum wallet,
the list of transactions and optimal gas price

description: Create a EthereumSync

params.name: api
params.description: A set of URLs for getting information about ethereum address

name: Start
description: The method that starts the synchronization Ethereum part of the wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<number>}

name: getBalance
description: Request to receive a balance of Ethereum wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<number>}

name: getTransactions
description: Request to receive Ethereum transaction list

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array>}

name: getGasPrice
description: Request to receive a amount of gas price

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<number>}

EthereumTx

Class EthereumTx.

params.name: data.fee

params.name: data.nonce
params.description: Nonce, transaction count of an account

return.description: Return a raw transaction in hex to send and transaction hash

Input information for creating the core.

Coin type (additional).

name: src/helpers/converters.js
src/helpers/coreHelper.js
generateMnemonic
description:
Generation of mnemonics.
The number of words in a mnemonic depends on the length of the entropy

unknown.tagValue: {string} - A mnemonic whose words are separated by spaces

params.name: entropyLength
params.description: The number of bits in the entropy. It can be equal to 128, 160, 192, 224 or 256 bits

return.description: A mnemonic whose words are separated by spaces

return.description: HEX strings entropy

name: src/helpers/errors.js
content:
export default {
  err_core_mnemonic: 'Wrong mnemonic phrase. Please, check the spelling and try again',
  err_core_mnemonic_length: 'Bad word count for mnemonic',
  err_core_mnemonic_empty: 'Invalid mnemonic',
  err_core_seed: 'Invalid seed',
  err_core_entropy: 'Bad entropy',
  err_core_xprv: 'Invalid xprv',
  err_core_hdkey: 'Invalid hdkey',
  err_core_btc_node: 'Error generating address. Check BTC node',
  err_core_btc_type: 'Invalid bitcoin address type. Supported types are p2pkh and p2wpkh',
  err_core_eth_node: 'Error generating ETH private key. Check ETH node',
  err_core_eth_private_key: 'Error generating ETH public key. Check ETH private key',
  err_core_eth_public_key: 'Error generating ETH address. Check ETH public key',
  err_core_eth_account: 'Invalid account. It must be an integer',
  err_core_derivation: 'Problem with derivation. Check node and derivation path',
  err_core_derivation_hdkey: 'HDkey is required',
  err_core_derivation_path: 'Invalid derivation path',
  err_core_derivation_range: 'Bad range. Check from/to params',
  err_core_private_key: 'Invalid private key. Expect buffer',
  err_tx_btc_balance: 'Insufficient balance',
  err_tx_btc_build: 'BTC transaction failed. Check all parameters',
  err_tx_btc_amount: 'Invalid amount. Amount must be a Number',
  err_tx_btc_fee: 'Invalid fee. Fee must be a Object with \`SAT\` parameter',
  err_tx_btc_unspent: 'Invalid unspent. Try to resync the BTC wallet',
  err_tx_btc_raw_tx: 'Problem getting raw transaction. Try to send again',
  err_tx_bch_amount: 'Invalid amount. Amount must be a Number',
  err_tx_bch_fee: 'Invalid fee. Fee must be a Object with \`SAT\` parameter',
  err_tx_bch_balance: 'Insufficient balance',
  err_tx_bch_build: 'BCH transaction failed. Check all parameters',
  err_tx_eth_balance: 'Insufficient balance',
  err_tx_eth_address: 'Invalid ethereum address',
  err_tx_eth_build: 'ETH transaction failed. Check all parameters',
  err_tx_eth_invalid_params: 'Invalid params. Nonce, value, gas price and gas limit have to be a number',
  err_tx_eth_invalid_params_string: 'Invalid params. Parameters "to" must be string based',
  err_tx_btcv_balance: 'Insufficient balance',
  err_tx_btcv_amount: 'Invalid amount. Amount must be a Number',
  err_tx_btcv_fee: 'Invalid fee. Fee must be a Object with \`SAT\` parameter',
  err_wallet_exist: 'Wallet not created. Use this method after creating a wallet',
  err_wallet_api: 'Api is not found! Please, use the setter apiEndpoint to install',
  err_wallet_api_type: 'Api must be an object!',
  err_btc_private_key_by_index: 'Key generation problem. Check the node and derivation index',
  err_get_bch_address: 'Problem with address conversion. Check the format of the source address'
}

name: src/helpers/handleErrors.js
CustomError
description:
Custom error object.
By the error code it substitutes the desired message from object 'errors'

name: src/index.js
Wallet
description: Class Wallet

name: constructor
description: Create a Wallet

params.name: api
params.description: A set of URLs for getting information about addresses

name: createNew
description: Creating a new wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} An object with core's information
{string} core.mnemonic - Imported mnemonic
{string} core.xprv - xprv key
{string} core.from - A import type
{Object} core.hdkey - A hierarchical deterministic keys
{Uint8Array} core.seed - Seed
{string} core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

return.description: core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

name: createByMnemonic
description: Creating a wallet by mnemonic

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} An object with core's information
{string} core.mnemonic - Imported mnemonic
{string} core.xprv - xprv key
{string} core.from - A import type
{Object} core.hdkey - A hierarchical deterministic keys
{Uint8Array} core.seed - Seed
{string} core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

return.description: core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

name: createByKey
description: Creating a wallet by xprv key

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} An object with core's information
{string} core.mnemonic - Imported mnemonic
{string} core.xprv - xprv key
{string} core.from - A import type
{Object} core.hdkey - A hierarchical deterministic keys
{Uint8Array} core.seed - Seed
{string} core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

return.description: core.seedInHex - Seed in hex format

name: createCoins
description: Creating a core for each supported currency type

unknown.tagValue: {Object} core.BTC - A BTC core that contains internal and external nodes, private and public keys and the first external user address
{Object} core.ETH - A ETH core that contains node, private and public keys and user address

params.name: coins[].coin
params.description: Short name of coin. Supported coins are BTC, ETH, BCH and BTCV

params.name: coins[].type
params.description: Coin type (additional). For BTC supported types are p2pkh and p2wpkh. For ETH type is a account number (by default 0).

return.description: core.ETH - A ETH core that contains node, private and public keys and user address

name: getChildNodes
description: The method returns node by derivation path

unknown.tagValue: {{node: {privateExtendedKey: *, publicExtendedKey: *}, list: []}} Returns object with node information
{Object} node - Contains privateExtendedKey and publicExtendedKey

{Array} list - Array of child nodes. Every child node contains the following parameters:
derivation path, publick key, private key in WIF format and addresses if a list of coins was sent

params.name: data.coins
params.description: Array of coins for generating addresses

return.description:
list - Array of child nodes. Every child node contains the following parameters:
derivation path, publick key, private key in WIF format and addresses if a list of coins was sent

name: syncBTC
description: The method starts synchronization of Bitcoin wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with Bitcoin synchronization information
{Object} sync
{Object} sync.addresses - Lists of internal, external and empty Bitcoin address
{Array} sync.transactions - The list of Bitcoin transactions
{Array} sync.unspent - The list of unspents addresses
{number} sync.balance - Bitcoin balance in Satoshi
{number} sync.latestBlock - The last block of the Bitcoin blockchain
{Array} sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

params.name: type
params.description: Bitcoin type. There may be p2pkh or p2wpkh

return.description: sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

name: syncETH
description: The method starts synchronization of Ethereum wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with Ethereum synchronization information
{Object} sync
{string} sync.address - Ethereum wallet address
{number} sync.balance - Ethereum balance in wei
{Array} sync.transactions - The list of Ethereum transactions
{number} sync.gasPrice - Gas price

return.description: sync.gasPrice - Gas price

name: syncBCH
description: The method starts synchronization of Bitcoin Cash wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with Bitcoin Cash synchronization information
{Object} sync
{Object} sync.addresses - Lists of internal, external and empty Bitcoin Cash address
{Array} sync.transactions - The list of Bitcoin Cash transactions
{Array} sync.unspent - The list of unspents addresses
{number} sync.balance - Bitcoin Cash balance in Satoshi
{number} sync.latestBlock - The last block of the Bitcoin Cash blockchain
{Array} sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

return.description: sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

name: syncBTCV
description: The method starts synchronization of Bitcoin Vault wallet

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with Bitcoin Vault synchronization information
{Object} sync
{Object} sync.addresses - Lists of internal, external and empty Bitcoin Vault address
{Array} sync.transactions - The list of Bitcoin Vault transactions
{Array} sync.unspent - The list of unspents addresses
{number} sync.balance - Bitcoin Vault balance in Satoshi
{number} sync.latestBlock - The last block of the Bitcoin Vault blockchain
{Array} sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

return.description: sync.fee - The list of fee per byte

name: makeRawBtcTx
description: The method returns a raw BTC transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with transaction hash and raw transaction data
{string} hash - Transaction hash
{string} tx - Raw Bitcoin transaction

params.name: data.inputs
params.description:
List of transaction inputs. Input contains the following parameters:
transaction hash, output n, address, value, script and private key in WIF format

params.name: data.outputs
params.description: List of transaction outpus. Output contains the following parameters: address and value

return.description: tx - Raw Bitcoin transaction

name: makeRawBchTx
description: The method returns a raw BCH transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with transaction hash and raw transaction data
{string} hash - Transaction hash
{string} tx - Raw Bitcoin Cash transaction

params.name: data.inputs
params.description:
List of transaction inputs. Input contains the following parameters:
transaction hash, output n, address, value in satoshis, script and private key in WIF format

params.name: data.outputs
params.description: List of transaction outpus. Output contains the following parameters: address and value in satoshis

return.description: tx - Raw Bitcoin Cash transaction

name: makeRawEthTx
description: The method returns a raw ETH transaction

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns object with transaction hash and raw transaction data
{string} hash - Transaction hash
{string} tx - Raw Ethereum transaction

params.name: data.gasPrice
params.description: The transaction's gas price in wei

params.name: data.privateKey
params.description: Private key of ether wallet in hex

return.description: tx - Raw Ethereum transaction

name: calculateFee
description: This method generates a list of transaction fees for the selected currency

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Array>} The list of transaction fees

params.name: params.currency
params.description: Selected currency. BTC, ETH, BCH or BTCV

params.name: params.addressType
params.description: Address type. Required for BTC transaction. Supported types are p2pkh or p2wpkh

params.name: params.account
params.description: Account number. Required for ETH transaction

params.name: params.size
params.description: Transaction size. Relevant for bitcoin transactions

return.description: The list of transaction fees

name: makeTransaction
description: Wrapper for the compilation of transactions of bitcoin and ether

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>}
{string} hash - Transaction hash
{string} tx - Raw bitcoin or ethereum transaction

params.name: data.addressType
params.description: Address type. Required for BTC transaction. Supported types are p2pkh or p2wpkh

params.name: data.account
params.description: Account number. Required for ETH transaction

return.description: tx - Raw bitcoin or ethereum transaction

name: setApiEndpoint
description: Sets the API Endpoint

params.name: api.btcFee
params.description: Url address of bitcoin fee endpoint

params.name: api.bch
params.description: Url address of bitcoin cash endpoint

params.name: api.btcv
params.description: Url address of bitcoin vault endpoint

name: src/workers/wallet.worker.js
create
description: Creating a wallet core

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<Object>} Returns information about the core

params.name: payload
params.description: Data for creating a core. Include in the creation method and mnemonic or key

return.description: Returns information about the core

name: createCoins
description: Creating a core for each supported currency type

params.name: payload
params.description: Array of coins to create cores for

name: transaction
description: Creating a transaction or getting fee

unknown.tagValue:
{Promise<Object>} Returns information about the success or failure of sending a transaction.
Or it returns the fee list

params.name: payload
params.description: Transaction method and input data for the transaction

return.description:
Returns information about the success or failure of sending a transaction.
Or it returns the fee list

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "lumi-web-core",
  "description": "Lumi Wallet Core - Web Version",
  "version": "1.3.1",
  "author": {
    "name": "vikowl",
    "email": "vd@lumiwallet.com"
  },
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/lumiwallet/lumi-web-core"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/lumiwallet/lumi-web-core",
  "keywords": [
    "lumi",
    "crypto",
    "wallet",
    "client-side",
    "web",
    "app"
  ],
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/lumiwallet/lumi-web-core/issues"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.11.2",
    "bchaddrjs": "^0.4.9",
    "bip39": "^3.0.2",
    "bip39-checker": "^1.1.7",
    "bitcoinjs-lib": "^5.2.0",
    "bitcore-lib-cash": "^8.22.0",
    "ethereumjs-tx": "^2.1.2",
    "ethereumjs-util": "^6.2.1",
    "hdkey": "^1.1.2",
    "web3-utils": "^1.2.11",
    "wif": "^2.0.6",
    "worker-loader": "^2.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.11.6",
    "@babel/core": "^7.11.6",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.11.5",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.11.5",
    "babel-jest": "^26.5.2",
    "babel-loader": "^8.1.0",
    "babel-plugin-module-resolver": "^4.0.0",
    "commitizen": "^4.2.1",
    "cz-conventional-changelog": "^3.2.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^6.8.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.22.0",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^4.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-sonarjs": "^0.5.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^4.0.1",
    "jest": "^26.5.2",
    "jest-fetch-mock": "^3.0.3",
    "randombytes": "^2.1.0",
    "webpack": "^4.44.1"
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">= 10.19.0"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist/"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rm -rf dist",
    "lint": "eslint --ext .js --ignore-path .gitignore .",
    "precommit": "npm run lint",
    "commit": "git-cz",
    "prepare": "npm run build",
    "build": "npm run clean && babel src --out-dir dist",
    "test": "jest --updateSnapshot",
    "test:coverage": "npm run test -- --coverage --watchAll=false",
    "preversion": "npm run test",
    "version": "npm run clean && npm run build",
    "postversion": "git add . && git push && git push --tags",
    "doc": "esdoc -c ./.esdoc"
  },
  "config": {
    "commitizen": {
      "path": "./node_modules/cz-conventional-changelog"
    }
  },
  "jest": {
    "moduleFileExtensions": [
      "js",
      "json"
    ],
    "roots": [
      "<rootDir>/__tests__"
    ],
    "transform": {
      "^.+\\.js$": "<rootDir>/node_modules/babel-jest"
    },
    "moduleNameMapper": {
      "^@/(.*)$": "<rootDir>/src/$1",
      "\\.worker.js": "<rootDir>/__mocks__/workerMock.js"
    },
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "coverageReporters": [
      "html"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
